title: 1.4 Master Challenge 1
question: Write a program that increases the input number by 3 using only the increment operator (++).Collect the input from the user and print the value of the variable before and after the increment

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
